human.card: Humans are curious beings who often venture out into the world to explore new places and meet new people. Once per long rest add +1 to your charisma roll when talking to someone.

elf.card: Elves are ancient beings who live long enough to gain generational knowledge. Their wisdom is a source of pride and belonging in elven society. One per long rest add +1 to wisdom rolls.

dwarf.card: Dwarves are persistent in their endeavors and highly value the traditions of their ancestors. They are known for their exceptional mental and physical toughness. Once per long rest add +1 to armor class.

gnome.card: Gnomes are creative tinkerers, eager to work on new inventions and solutions. They are peaceful beings focused on their inventions. Once per long rest add +1 to strterity rolls.
